entry.title: @@NAME_AND_TITLE@@
entry.content:
The Leading Graduate School is please to announce the following special lecture:

Title: Globalization and the Law 2.0: The emergence of World Society, the Transformation of State, Interdisciplinary Discourses, and Consequences for Legal Research and Education

Presenter: Prof. Peer Zumbansen

Date & Time: (Fri) 8 Mar 2013, 15:00-17:00

Place: CALE Forum

Language: English

Peer Zumbansen is Professor of Law in the Osgoode Hall Law School at York University.
